des: "I whipped this up one day to put over a chocolate cake I made in a BundtÂ® cake pan. If you like white chocolate, you'll like this ganache."
ins: Pour heavy cream into a saucepan over medium heat; heat until just boiling. Remove from heat; add white chocolate chips. Whisk gently until white chocolate chips are melted and blended into the cream. Let cool until slightly thickened, about 15 minutes.
